DOC.brief_summary: This study postmenopausal woman investigate Drug-drug interaction ( DDI ) itraconazole ( ITZ ) orally administer vilaprisan ; absolute bioavailability use intravenous microtracer dose [ 14C ] vilaprisan .
DOC.brief_title: Study Postmenopausal Women Investigate Drug-drug Interaction ( DDI ) Between Itraconazole ( ITZ ) Orally Administered Vilaprisan ; Absolute Bioavailability Using Intravenous Microtracer Dose 14CVilaprisan
DOC.criteria: Body mass index ( BMI ) : 18 ≤ BMI ≤ 32 kg/m² Postmenopausal state reveal : Medical history , applicable ( natural menopause least 12 month prior first study drug administration ; surgical menopause bilateral ovariectomy least 3 month prior first study drug administration ) , addition : woman < 65 year old , follicle stimulate hormone ( FSH ) > 40 IU/L Incompletely cure preexisting disease assume absorption , distribution , metabolism , elimination effect study drug normal Known suspect liver disease Clinically relevant finding ( e.g . blood pressure , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) ; physical gynecological examination , laboratory examination )
